LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.label: dictated by stars
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.description:
The endless sea of stars in our skies will dictate my future, be it benevolent or otherwise.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - After every Divine the Stars ritual, a solar eclipse or an aurora, mood will randomly change between -30 and +30.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_DictatedByStars.comps.0.thought: Stars are not on my side
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.label: shared
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Shared.description:
Empathy is a quality we must all strive to possess. We bear each other's burdens as well as each other's jubilations.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - If the average colony mood is happy, colonists receive a positive thought, and vice versa.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_LowExpectations.label: low spirits
LanguageData.VME_Mood_LowExpectations.description: We are stranded on a lost, forgotten planet on the Rim. Things can hardly get worse.
LanguageData.VME_Mood_Normal.label: normal
LanguageData.VME_Mood_HighExpectations.label: high spirits
LanguageData.VME_Mood_HighExpectations.description: The whole world is ours to explore and enjoy.
